name: Laws
description: Legal frameworks and statutes governing organizational and regulatory practices.

name: Policies
description: Formal policies that outline principles, rules, and guidelines for decision-making and operations.

name: Regulations
description: Detailed rules and directives issued by authorities to enforce laws and policies.

name: Manuals
description: Comprehensive guides and instructions for executing organizational processes and practices.

name: Charters
description: Formal documents defining the structure, purpose, and authority of organizational entities.

name: Directives
description: Official instructions or orders issued by authorities to enforce compliance.

name: Circulars
description: Formal communications providing updates, instructions, or clarifications on policies and procedures.

name: Contracts
description: Legally binding agreements defining terms, obligations, and conditions between parties.

name: Acts
description: Legislative enactments passed by governing bodies that establish legal obligations and rights.
